findings.title: Uniqueness of liquidity token contracts
findings.description: The uniqueness requirement of liquidity token contract for each exchange is not systematically enforced, allowing multiple exchanges to be associated with the same liquidity token contract, leading to potential profit exploitation.

findings.title: Verification of token and liquidity token contract implementations
findings.description: The implementation of token and liquidity token contracts needs to be verified to ensure it satisfies requirements for safety and security of Dexter, including no allowance or borrowing granted for Dexter-owned tokens and no delayed balance update in token transfers.
